alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 4:46PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Placer, northeastern Yuba, southwestern Sierra and western Nevada Counties through 545 PM PST... At 445 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near American House to near Alta Sierra. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grass Valley, Downieville, Lake Of The Pines, Colfax, Cherokee, Delevan National Wildlife Refuge, Cedar Ridge, Iowa Hill, Bald Mountain Summit, Rough And Ready, Scotts Flat, Alleghany, White Cloud Campground, Weimar, Pike, Alta Sierra, Camptonville, Foresthill, Nevada City and Skillman Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada
